CustomField.formula: IF(RecordType.DeveloperName ="AE_SB",'AddOn '+ Name +' '+ AE_SB__r.Name, IF(RecordType.DeveloperName ="mp_AE_SB_Accommodation", 'AddOn '+ Name +' '+ AE_SB_Accommodation__r.Name, IF(RecordType.DeveloperName ="Airline_Upgrade",'AddOn '+ Name +' '+ Airline_Upgrade__r.Name, IF(RecordType.DeveloperName ="Land_Activity",'AddOn '+ Name +' '+ land_activity__r.Name, IF(RecordType.DeveloperName ="SubStopover",'AddOn '+ Name +' '+ Sub_Stopover__r.Name, IF(RecordType.DeveloperName ="Insurance",'AddOn '+ Name +' '+ RecordType.Name,null) ) ) ) ))
CustomField.label: AddOn Name For Component Accordian
